presentationColumns.name: Transfer Orders Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of distinct Transfer Order Headers.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV Transfer Orders.Transfer Orders Count

presentationColumns.name: Transfer Order Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of distinct Transfer Order Lines.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV Transfer Orders.Transfer Order Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: Open Transfer Orders Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of distinct Transfer Orders where the Transfer Order Status is 'Open'.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV Transfer Orders.Open Transfer Orders Count

presentationColumns.name: Open Transfer Order Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of all Transfer Order Lines where Transfer Order Line Status is 'Open'.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV Transfer Orders.Open Transfer Order Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: Return Transfer Order Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of Return Transfer Order Lines where Transfer Order Line Status is 'Open' and Transaction Origin type is 'Return'.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV Transfer Orders.Return Transfer Order Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: Closed Transfer Order Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of all Transfer Order Lines where Transfer Order Line Status is 'Closed'.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV Transfer Orders.Closed Transfer Order Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: Cancelled Transfer Order Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of all Transfer Order Lines where Transfer Order Line Status is 'Cancelled'.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV Transfer Orders.Cancelled Transfer Order Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: Ordered Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of Requested quantity.

presentationColumns.name: Return Transfer Order Delivered Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of Delivered Quantity where Transaction Origin type is 'Return'.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV Transfer Orders.Return Transfer Order Delivered Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Cancelled Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of Cancelled Quantity.

presentationColumns.name: Shipped Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of Shipped Quantity.

presentationColumns.name: Received Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of Received Quantity.

presentationColumns.name: Delivered Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of Delivered Quantity.
